    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnimatedBackground
     
    AnimationConstants
    Animation-related constants.
    AnimationFactory
    Factory class for creating common animations.
    Board
    Represents the game board interface for the Tetris game.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick (tetromino).
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating Tetris bricks.
    BrickRotator
    Manages brick rotation state and provides rotation functionality.
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of clearing rows from the game board.
    ColorManager
    Manages color mapping for game bricks and UI elements.
    CountdownPanel
    Panel that displays a countdown animation before the game starts.
    DownData
    Immutable record containing data returned after a brick moves down.
    EventSource
    Enumeration representing the source of a game event.
    EventType
    Enumeration representing the type of movement event.
    FontLoader
    Utility class for loading fonts from resources.
    GameController
    Main game controller that coordinates between the game logic (Board) and the user interface (GuiController).
    GameMode
    Enumeration of available game modes.
    GamemodesController
    Controller for the game modes selection screen.
    GameOverPanel
    Panel displayed when the game ends.
    GameUIConstants
    UI-related constants for the game.
    GuiController
    Main GUI controller for the Tetris game.
    HighScoreManager
    Manages the game's high score persistence.
    HowToPlayController
    Controller for the "How to Play" tutorial screen.
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling game input events.
    LeaderboardManager
    Manages the game leaderboard with top player scores.
    LeaderboardManager.LeaderboardEntry
    Record representing a single leaderboard entry.
    LeaderboardPanel
    Panel that displays the game leaderboard.
    Level
    Represents a game level with specific objectives and constraints.
    LevelCompletePanel
    Panel displayed when a level is completed successfully.
    LevelManager
    Manages game levels for the levels game mode.
    LevelProgressManager
    Manages level progress persistence for the levels game mode.
    LevelsController
    Controller for the levels selection screen.
    Main
    Main entry point for the TetrisJFX application.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu screen.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class for matrix operations used in the Tetris game.
    MoveEvent
    Immutable record representing a game input event.
    MusicManager
    Manages background music playback for the game.
    MusicSelectionDialog
    Dialog for selecting background music track.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable record containing information about the next brick rotation state.
    NotificationPanel
    Panel that displays score notifications when lines are cleared.
    PausePanel
    Panel displayed when the game is paused.
    PlayerNameDialog
    Dialog for entering player name for score submission.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Implementation of BrickGenerator that generates random Tetris bricks.
    ResourceLoader
    Utility class for loading resources from the classpath.
    SceneNavigator
    Utility class for navigating between scenes and loading FXML files.
    Score
    Manages the game score and cleared lines count.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings screen.
    SettingsManager
    Manages persistent application settings.
    SimpleBoard
    Implementation of the Board interface representing the game board.
    SoundManager
    Manages all sound effects in the game.
    Tetris1984Controller
    Controller for the 1984-themed game mode.
    ViewData
    Immutable data class containing all information needed to render the game view.
    WindowConstants
    Centralized constants for window dimensions and UI sizing.
